text: General Justin Metsing Lekhanya (7 April 1938 â€“ 20 January 2021) was a Lesotho politician. He was the Chairman of the Military Council of Lesotho from 24 January 1986 to 2 May 1991. He was born in Thaba-Tseka, Lesotho. Lekhanya died on 20 January 2021, aged 82. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Lesotho
title: Justin Lekhanya
